mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.aci_id, b.aci_name, count(c.bcmi_bdi_seq) as comment_cnt FROM board_info a left outer join account_info b on a.bdi_aci_seq = b.aci_seq left outer join board_comment_info c on a.bdi_seq = c.bcmi_bdi_seq where bdi_status = 1 and (bdi_title like '%${keyword}%' or bcmi_comment like '%${keyword}%') group by a.bdi_seq limit 10 offset #{offset}
SELECT ceil(count(*)/10) from board_info where bdi_status = 1 and bdi_title like '%${keyword}%' or bdi_comment like '%${keyword}%' limit 10 offset #{offset}
SELECT a.*, b.aci_id, b.aci_name FROM board_info a left outer join account_info b on a.bdi_aci_seq = b.aci_seq where bdi_status = 1 and bdi_seq = #{seq}
SELECT ceil(count(*)/10) from board_comment_info limit 10 offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment_info (bcmi_aci_seq, bcmi_bdi_seq, bcmi_comment, bcmi_status) VALUES (#{bcmi_aci_seq}, #{bcmi_bdi_seq}, #{bcmi_comment}, 1);
